Detailed Description

Packet send as an ack.

to the leader when the Module is finished loading the map.

Definition at line 69 of file LoadMapPacket.h.

uint32  mapSize
) 
 

Constructor.

Parameters:
req The RequestPacket this reply is send as an answer/ack to.
status The status of the maploading.
mapSize The size of the map. Used by Reader to balance memory use.
